ISSUE.TITLE: Localization issues
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: release-4.30-beta Steps to reproduce the problem: **Fail to import language resource file:** 1. Create a second language 2. Import a language file 3. It will broke the primary web site language (and possible duplicate some items in LocaleStringResource table) **Performance issue:** 1. Create a second language 2. Import a language file 3. Reimport the same language file 4. For each resource item, the code will run GetLocaleStringResourceByName method, it will go to database to obtain a instance of LocaleStringResource 5. It should avoid those round-trips in database PR to solve those issues: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/pull/4373
